name: Rugbee
description:
In Rugbee, each player takes on the role of a team of various insects (and arachnids) in order to play a game of rugby with crazy rules.

Each team has in its ranks :

  • A bee, which uses its mobility to surprise its opponents
  • A beetle, whose strength will destabilize the competition
  • A spider, using its webs to disrupt the playing field

In order not to give bad examples to the next generations of insects (and arachnids), the matches are played in a non-violent way. Indeed, contrary to the original rules of Rugbee, it is now forbidden to sting, entangle or push your opponents into the ground in order to eliminate them.

    Let the game begin!
